page.title: 03FASHION SCENE.
page.content: While interviewing my older sister I found out that her favourite{clothes were Baggy trousers in bright colours because in her mind they look outrageous.The style of{earrings}were short round ones.For a{Disco}the amount of{Â£17.00}was willing to be paid.The colour of{make up}was{ {purple,blue and pink}because they were bright colours.Out of all the{fashions her favourite was{suits with ties.} The favourite{hairstyle}is short, bottom of the neck length with a long fringe.A choice of anything to wear was{white baggy trousers,white {shirt,white sports jacket,pink {shoes,pink tie and a fawn boater}which is a hat.The favourite fashion{ {designer}was{Zandra Rhodes.}A favourite shop to buy{clothes}in was{ {Chelsea Girl}in Inverness. { }
